existing_features.title: Create a complete, playable, arcade-style game (single-player) that is immediately fun, easy to learn, and hard to master, with a core loop designed for repeated short runs (e.g., 30–120 seconds) and a clear fail state + instant restart.

Implement a polished game feel layer: responsive controls (keyboard + pointer/touch), hit feedback, screen shake/juice (subtle), particle/visual effects, and a difficulty curve that ramps over time to sustain challenge.

Add progression and retention hooks that do not require external services: persistent unlocks/skins/perks earned via play, a simple meta-currency, and at least one “just one more run” mechanic (e.g., near-miss bonus, streak multiplier, or risk/reward pickups).
Integrate Internet Identity sign-in and use it to associate saved progression and scores with the user; allow unauthenticated play but clearly prompt sign-in to save progress/submit scores.

Create a cohesive, distinctive visual theme for the entire game UI (colors, typography, layout, and motion language) and apply it consistently across menus, HUD, results screen, and leaderboard. Do not use a blue/purple default theme.
Add player-facing settings and accessibility basics: volume toggle, reduced motion toggle, control remapping (at least for primary actions on keyboard), and a pause/resume flow.
Add generated static art assets for the game (logo, background/scene art, and a small set of icons) and render them in the UI from frontend static files (do not serve images through the backend).

Retheme all user-facing UI copy to match a Pepe-the-frog / “toad killer” cryptocurrency meme aesthetic, replacing the current “NEON DODGE” branding and generic arcade phrasing across the landing screen, HUD, pause overlay, results screen, unlocks UI, settings, and leaderboard surfaces.

Update the visual theme (colors/gradients/typography treatments) to a cohesive Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme aesthetic and apply it consistently across menus, HUD, modals, and results, including updating global theme variables so the UI no longer reads as a neon sci‑fi palette.

Retheme the in-game rendering to match the Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme aesthetic by updating the canvas scene visuals (background, player, obstacles, power-ups, particles) so they no longer look like neon abstract circles on a sci‑fi grid.

Retheme progression/unlocks presentation to match the cryptocurrency meme aesthetic by renaming and re-describing perks and currency in the shop UI (keeping existing IDs/data flow intact), and ensure icons/emblems match the new theme.

Render the updated/generated theme art assets from static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and update existing screens that reference the old logo/background to use the new themed versions (no backend image serving).

Upgrade all visual art assets to AAA-level quality while keeping the current Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme aesthetic, including high-fidelity backgrounds, in-game sprites, and UI iconography, and ensure assets look crisp on high-DPI/retina displays.

Improve the in-game canvas rendering fidelity in the 2D renderer to feel 'AAA': incorporate more detailed sprite rendering for player/tokens/hazards, better composition/lighting (e.g., layered/parallax background feel, vignette/atmospheric overlay), and higher-quality particles/VFX, while honoring the existing Reduced Motion setting.

Upgrade the UI presentation to AAA-level visual polish across Landing, HUD, Results, Leaderboard, Settings, and Shop screens by using higher-quality graphical elements (e.g., premium backgrounds/overlays and a cohesive custom icon set where appropriate) while keeping all existing UI flows and English user-facing text intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build an extremely fun, addicting game (creative freedom granted; platform/genre TBD).

Implement a backend-backed global leaderboard (e.g., daily and all-time) with basic anti-spam/anti-cheat constraints appropriate for a casual game (e.g., rate limits per principal, reasonable score validation, and server-side canonical best score tracking).
Retheme the game with a Pepe-the-frog / “toad killer” meme aesthetic across UI, visuals, and messaging.
Add cryptocurrency-themed elements (e.g., coins/tokens, crypto-styled currency, related UI copy/art) integrated into scoring/progression cosmetics.
Upgrade all game graphics/art assets to AAA-level quality (high-fidelity UI, icons, backgrounds, and in-game visuals).
